src:
PATRIOTSKI TIKET 03: Sve, pa i najvijačko srce na keca
Na kvoti pet uz crveno i crno - bele junake košarkaške Srbije

05 Nov 2019

Šta je to sportski patriotizam? Kako se i zašto vole timovi iz svoje otadžbine? Odgovor je iz srca, a kladilački bi to moglo da se iskaže i preko tiketa, ma koje boje da su vam mile... Crvene, ili crno - bele, tek MOZZART je za vas spremio prosto neodoljivu ponudu od dva za nas najbitnija košarkaška keca. Pod jedan, sve je na PATRIOTSKOM TIKETU 03, a pod dva morate požuriti da bi umesto kvote 3,92 za sebe obezbedili čistu peticu... Ova specijalna ponuda važi do 20.00 časova, kada s prvim zviuždukom na Evrokup meču Partizana s Venecijom čekamo pobedu Trinkijerijovih izabranika.


ut. 20.00: (1,45) PARTIZAN (15,0) VENECIJA (3,05)



čet. 19.00: (2,55) CRVENA ZVEZDA (14,5) REAL MADRID (1,60)


U četvrtak smo uz Crvenu zvezdu i Real Madrid od 19.00 časova u Evroligi, ponovo na kecu, što nas u slučaju povoljnog ishoda dovodi do zagarantovane, kompanijski nabildovane kvote 5,00. Pošto takve koeficijente sa samo dva para ne možete obezbediti bukvalno nigde, vaš igrački hedonizam do dogovorenog časa možete iskoristiti na dva načina. Trknite do svog omiljenog MOZZART lokala i poterateru zatražite PATRIOTSKI TIKET 03, ili sve odradite putem mozzartbet.com aplikacije. DONESITE PATRIOTSKU ODLUKU! Odigrajte mudro na najbolje klubove košarkaške Srbije u Evropi i uživate u kraljici igara.  





* Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
PATRIOTIC TICKET 03: Everything, even the fiercest heart on the ace
At odds of five with the red and black and white heroes of basketball Serbia

05 Nov 2019

What is sports patriotism? How and why do teams from their homeland love it? The answer is from the heart, and the betting could be expressed through the ticket, whatever color they may be to you ... Red, or black and white, only MOZZART has prepared for you a simply irresistible offer from two of our most important basketball aces . Under one, it's all on PATRIOT TICKET 03, and under two you have to hurry to get a clean five instead of a 3.92 quota ... Trinquire's elect.


Tue. 20.00: (1.45) PARTIZAN (15.0) VENICE (3.05)



Thu. 7pm: (2.55) RED STAR (14.5) REAL MADRID (1.60)


On Thursday we are back with Red Star and Real Madrid from 19.00 in the Euroleague again, which in the case of a favorable outcome leads us to a guaranteed, company-wide odds of 5.00. Since you can't provide such odds with just two pairs anywhere, you can use your gaming hedonism up to the agreed time in two ways. Run to your favorite MOZZART store and ask for a PATRIOT TICKET 03, or go through the mozzartbet.com application. Bring a Patriotic Decision! Play wisely at the best basketball clubs in Serbia in Europe and enjoy the queen of games.





* Odds are subject to change
